root.name: I am Jesus
root.description: OverviewI am Jesus by suicide entertainment is a religion offending flash game, that at its core has some of the most basic elements of a a normal video game. Some say that the game is a break through in flash games because it consists of some more complex tasks, and usually preforms them well. However, most of the achievements seem to be forgotten or overlooked by the game's somewhat controversial content and story. Suicidal Entertainment have announced that a game with the same cores, but with lighter content is on its way.
